mapper.select: SELECT a.assignment_no assignmentNo, a.opened_lec_no openedLecNo, a.assignment_title assignmentTitle, a.assignment_content assignmentContent, 'N' AS assignmentDid, '평가전' as assignmentScore, a.create_date createDate FROM assignment a, student_lecture l, student s WHERE a.opened_lec_no = l.opened_lec_no AND l.student_code = s.student_code AND l.opened_lec_no = #{openedLecNo} AND s.student_code = #{studentCode}

SELECT a.opened_lec_no openedLecNo, t.lecture_name lectureName, a.assignment_title assignmentTitle, a.assignment_content assignmentContent, a.end_date endDate FROM assignment a, opened_lecture o, total_lecture t WHERE a.opened_lec_no = o.opened_lec_no AND o.lecture_code = t.lecture_code AND a.assignment_no = #{assignmentNo}
